item.description:
Pretty much the same concept as the Warrior Dash. Register in the link below. Send an inbox note to either Vaibhav, Suren, Kinjal or me, if you would like to join the team. You will still need to register individually and then add yourself to the created Team. One of us will provide you with the team name and details. So please buy your own tickets first.

*** MAKE SURE YOU REGISTER UNDER THE CORRECT DATE! ***

http://www.spartanrace.com/new-england-obstacle-racing-spartan-sprint.html

Â 

=========================================

OLD NOTE FOR WARRIOR DASH.

So a few people are planning to do tough Mudder in October. I wanted to suggest Warrior Dash which is an easier version of Tough Mudder as a preparation for the tougher challenge. It is based on the same concept as tough mudder ie there are obstacles on the way (scramble under barbed wire, run through fire etc) The race is only 5K (3 Miles) as compared to 12 miles for tough mudder. Please see below for more info:
item.name: Spartan Race (NOT Warrior Dash anymore)
